DOC.brief_summary: The investigators aim to determine the complications and risk factors related with peripherally inserted central catheters (PICCs) and central venous catheters (CVCs) in cancer patients.
DOC.brief_title: Complications and Risk Factors Related With Central Venous Catheters in Cancer Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to determine the complications and risk factors related with peripherally inserted central catheters (PICCs) and central venous catheters (CVCs) in cancer patients.
DOC.criteria: all adult cancer patients with central venous catheters (CVCs) or peripherally inserted central catheters (PICCs) placed at BeijingHCH. without written informed consent
